sourcesContent:
import { useEffect } from "react" import { useLocation } from "react-router" import axios from "axios" import "./postshow.css" export default function PostShow() { const location = useLocation() const path = location.pathname.split("/")[2] const [post, setPost] = useEffect(() => { const getPost = async () => { const res = await axios.get("/posts/" + path) console.log(res) } getPost() }, [path]) return (
